actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain corporations from the provisions requiring the accrual method of accounting for corporations engaged in farming.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt certain corporations substantially owned by members of two or three families from the requirement that corporations engaged in farming use the accrual method of accounting.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain corporations from the provisions requiring the accrual method of accounting for corporations engaged in farming.
